metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000159 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Command injection in evince via filename when printing to PDF. This affectsversions earlier than 3.25.91.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000159` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

evince - 3.18.2-1ubuntu4.3
evince-common - 3.18.2-1ubuntu4.3
evince-gtk - 3.18.2-1ubuntu4.3
gir1.2-evince-3.0 - 3.18.2-1ubuntu4.3
libevdocument3-4 - 3.18.2-1ubuntu4.3
libevview3-3 - 3.18.2-1ubuntu4.3
No subscription required

atril - 1.12.2-1ubuntu0.3
atril-common - 1.12.2-1ubuntu0.3
gir1.2-atril - 1.12.2-1ubuntu0.3
libatrildocument3 - 1.12.2-1ubuntu0.3
libatrilview3 - 1.12.2-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: evince package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.18.2-1ubuntu4.3').
atril package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.12.2-1ubuntu0.3').
